minions.name: Nukebot
minions.description: Ongoing: After this minion is destroyed, destroy each other player's minions on this base

minions.name: Warbot
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed

minions.name: Hoverbot
minions.description: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a minion, you may play it as an extra minion. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck

minions.name: Zapbot
minions.description: You may play an extra minion of power 2 or less

minions.name: Microbot Fixer
minions.description: If this is the first minion you played this turn, you may play an extra minion. Ongoing: Each of your Microbots gains +1 power

minions.name: Microbot Guard
minions.description: Destroy a minion on this base with power less than the number of minions you have here

minions.name: Microbot Reclaimer
minions.description: If this is the first minion you played this turn, you may play an extra minion. Shuffle any number of Microbots from your discard pile into your deck

minions.name: Microbot Alpha
minions.description: Ongoing: Gains +1 power for each of your other Microbots. All of your minions are considered Microbots

minions.name: Microbot Archive
minions.description: Ongoing: After one of your Microbots (including this one) is destroyed, draw a card

actions.name: Heirloom
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This card gives this minion +1 power for each Heirloom on it. This card cannot be destroyed
